problem_text_cn: 如图,已知点M为▱ABCD边AB的中点,线段CM交BD于点E,S~△BEM~=1,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the point M is the midpoint of edge AB of ▱ABCD, the line segment CM intersects BD at the point E, S~△BEM~ = N_0, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∵AM=BM,∴\frac{BM}{DC}=\frac{BE}{DE}=\frac{EM}{EC}=\frac{1}{2},∴S~△DEM~=2S~△EBM~,S~△EBC~=2S~△EBM~,∵S~△BEM~=1,∴S~△DEM~=S~△EBC~=2,∴S~阴~=2+2=4,故选:C．
